General.Name: Korea Petroleum Industries Co
General.Description: Korea Petroleum Industries Company produces and sells asphalts, solvents, and building materials. It offers blown asphalt; and construction materials, including tar and water base polyurethane, waterstops, sheet membranes, tapes, cold patches, sealants, emulsions, primers, ceramic powders, and other materials. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
